howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting the best exchange rate is simple with our three-step process
howItWorks.step1Description: Find the best exchange rates in your area with real-time pricing
howItWorks.step2Description: Secure your preferred rate and reserve your currency exchange
howItWorks.step3Description: Visit the location and collect your exchanged currency safely

userTypes.touristDescription: Find the best local rate online and travel with confidence knowing you're getting the most value for your money.
userTypes.bureauDescription: Boost visibility, manage rates online, and connect with travelers looking for the best currency exchange deals.

betaFeedback.title: Help Us Improve - Share Your Feedback!
